title: How Many Calories Are in 10 Almonds?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 10 almonds, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per serving, and easy tweaks for your snack.
h1: How Many Calories Are in 10 Almonds?
assumptions: Raw, whole almonds; unsalted. Approximate weight: 1.2 g per almond.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by almond variety, size, processing (raw vs. roasted), and brand. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 10 raw almonds provide about 70 kcal and 3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Salted roasted (adds sodium, no calorie change)

faqs.q: How many calories in one almond?

faqs.a: Yes, 10 almonds provide ~3 g protein, plus healthy fats.

faqs.q: Do roasted almonds have more calories than raw?
faqs.a: Oil-roasted can add 2â€“3 kcal per almond; dry-roasted are similar to raw.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in 10 almonds?
faqs.a: Approximately 2 g of dietary fiber, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: How does almond size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger almonds have slightly more calories; values based on average 1.2 g size.
